root.Summary: 1: Vecellio M, Roberts AR, Cohen CJ, Cortes A, Knight JC, Bowness P, WordsworthBP. The genetic association of RUNX3 with ankylosing spondylitis can be explainedby allele-specific effects on IRF4 recruitment that alter gene expression. AnnRheum Dis. 2015 Oct 9. pii: annrheumdis-2015-207490. doi:10.1136/annrheumdis-2015-207490. [Epub ahead of print] PubMed PMID: 26452539.
